RightParserResult.Subject: Huddle Account Activation Code
RightParserResult.TextBody:
Welcome ASC,
Thanks for joining Huddle! To activate your account follow the link below:
http://my.huddle.net/signup/activation.aspx?activationCode=50ed7d3d-edf6-4d46-8504-bfe994421474
(If it does not work, copy the link, paste it into your browser, and hit "Enter / Return." Please ensure you copy the whole link, as it may wrap over two lines.)
Alternatively, you can copy the activation code below and enter it into the “Activate My Account” box.
Account Activation Code: 50ed7d3d-edf6-4d46-8504-bfe994421474
Thanks for joining, and welcome to Huddle!
Regards,
The Huddle Team http://www.huddle.net/
